title: Integrate Working Directory Configuration
description: Update main.py to accept a --workdir argument and pass it to the ProjectManager.
close_reason: Implemented --workdir argument and updated ProjectManager to use environment variable fallback.

title: Extract AppBar Component
description: Create src/sysengn/ui/components/app_bar.py and refactor main.py to use it.

title: Update Data Models and Database Schema
description: Add 'path' and 'repo_url' fields to the Project model and update the SQLite schema to support them.

title: Implement File System Integration
description:
The sysengn tool requires file system integration to manage data and projects via git.

Requirements:
- Support a working directory parameter (defaults to current working directory).
- Enforce directory structure: {working_directory}/{user_directory}/{repo_directory}.
- Git integration is core to the workflow.
- Repositories within the user directory represent SysEngn projects.
- Functionality to add new projects by creating or cloning repositories into the user directory.

title: Refactor UI into Reusable Components
description:
Create a /ui/components directory and extract reusable UI elements to improve modularity and maintainability.

Tasks:
1.  Create `src/sysengn/ui/components` directory.
2.  **Extract AppBar Component**:
    -   Create `app_bar.py` in `components`.
    -   Should accept an icon (logo) and a dictionary of tabs ({name: Component}).
    -   Should handle navigation callbacks.
    -   Refactor `build_banner` in `main.py` to use this new component.
3.  **Extract Login Page Component**:
    -   Create `login_page.py` in `components` (or refactor existing `ui/login_screen.py` to be more component-like).
    -   Should accept parameters: `icon`, `oauth_providers` (list/dict), `allow_user_pass` (bool).
    -   Refactor `main.py` and `login_screen.py` to use this parameterized approach.
4.  **Verify**:
    -   Ensure app still launches and navigates correctly.
    -   Run tests and linting.

title: Extract Login Page Component
description: Refactor login screen into a reusable parameterized component in src/sysengn/ui/components/login_view.py

title: Update UI for Project Creation
description: Modify the New Project dialog in PMScreen to accept an optional Repository URL and display project paths.

title: IndexError in get_all_projects after schema update
description: The application crashes on login with IndexError: No item with that key in get_all_projects. This is caused by the local SQLite database missing the 'path' and 'repo_url' columns added in the recent feature update. The code expects these columns to exist.
close_reason: Implemented auto-migration in init_db to add missing columns to existing databases.

title: Verify UI Refactoring
description: Run tests and linting to ensure no regressions.

title: Implement File System and Git Logic
description: Update ProjectManager to handle file system operations: ensuring user directories, initializing git repos, and cloning remote repos.

title: Add Tests and Verify File System Integration
description: Write pytest tests for the new file system and git functionality, and ensure all linting passes.
close_reason: Added tests for git integration and verified with pytest, ruff, and pyright
